commands.command: CREATE TABLE ItemGroupTbl ( [ItemGroupID] AUTOINCREMENT, [GroupItemTypeID] INT, [ItemTypeID] INT, [ItemTypeSortPos] INT, [Enabled] YESNO, [Notes] MEMO, CONSTRAINT [pk_ItemGroupID] PRIMARY KEY (ItemGroupID) )

CREATE TABLE UsedItemGroupTbl ( [UsedItemGroupID] AUTOINCREMENT, [ContactID] INT, [GroupItemTypeID] INT, [LastItemTypeID] INT, [LastItemTypeSortPos] INT, [LastItemDateChanged] DATETIME, [Notes] MEMO, CONSTRAINT [pk_UsedItemGroupID] PRIMARY KEY (UsedItemGroupID) )
ALTER TABLE SysDataTbl ADD GroupItemTypeID INT
INSERT INTO ServiceTypesTbl (ServiceType, Description, PackagingID, PrepTypeID) VALUES ("Group","Group Item",3,2)
